publisher: Farmington Hills, Mich. : Charles Scribner's Sons
description: This encyclopedia covers LGBTQ topics in Africa, Asia, Europe, Latin America and the Caribbean, and the Middle East, as well as North America, and takes an interdisciplinary approach to the subject, using film, literature, human rights, politics, landmark legislation, activism, the arts, language, sports, and historical events as points of entry into the content.
contributor: Arondekar, Anjali R., 1968- editor.$$QArondekar, Anjali R.
series: Global Encyclopedia of Lesbian Gay Bisexual and Transgender History Ser.$$QGlobal Encyclopedia of Lesbian Gay Bisexual and Transgender History Ser.
